author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: تَرَى مَطْلَعَ آيَاتِكَ فِي ظُلُمَاتِ الإِمْكَانِ أَيْنَ شَمْسُ أُفُقِ عِنَايَتِكَ يَا نَوَّارَ العَالَمِينَ *
translation: Thou seest the Dayspring of Thine utterance in the darkness of creation: Where is the sun of the heaven of Thy grace, O Lightgiver of the worlds?
